fields.summary: Submit Tickets form in aptana is severely broken

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Trying to send ticket on Emulator problem.

h3. Actual Result
errorMessage [illegal unquoted charater ((CTRL-CHAR,Code13)); has to be escaped using backslash to be included in string value. Source Apache.catalina.connector.CoyoteInputStream@4445d0cc line 8 column 87]']}

h3. Expected Result
Send Ticket

comments.body:
Hi Ron,

Can you please provided additional details here. Not sure what the problem is. If you can give us more details and some steps to reproduce it, we can help to solve it.

Regards,
Tested with  Ti Studio 3.1.2.201308091617, it's working fine.

tested with Aptana Studio 3, build: 3.4.2.201308081805
its __NOT__ fine

try making the report at the end of this post, you'll find its impossible to submit ticket, only getting an error (which you can see here https://mediacru.sh/_lUgNm692GGm )
my best guess? for some reason, the text is put thru a regex, and som1 forgot to regex_quote($str,'delimiter') , and the "'s cause invalid regex syntax, but thats just a guess..

make the following report
title:
delete this report
description: 
delete this report
there is a bug with the aptana "submit a ticket" form,
im trying to locate it
expected:
delete this report
actual:
delete this report
